g.text: Starts the process remove a product.
Shows to the Administrator a list of pharmacies and asks him to choose the one he wants remove a product.
Selects the Pharmacy he wants remove a product.
Shows to the Administrator a list of products and asks him to choose the one he wants remove.
Selects the product he wants remove.
Displays the data, asking him to confirm it.
Informs about the success of the operation.
